Skills: We are looking for a talented full stack web developer to join our team and help us build and maintain our e-commerce websites and operating system. The ideal candidate will have experience with Python, Django, React, MySQL, and AWS.
Responsibilities:
Develop and maintain our e-commerce website using Python, Django, Rest Api , React, and MySQL
Develop and maintain our operating system using Python and AWS
Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues
Work with other developers and engineers to build and improve our systems
Qualifications:
3+ years of experience in full stack web development with Python
Experience with Django and MySQL
Experience with AWS
Strong problem-solving and debugging skills
Excellent communication and teamwork skills
Application Question(s):
Have you worked on E-Commerce Websites (Back-End & Front-End)
Have you managed E-Commerce Websites
How many E-Commerce Websites have you worked on
What are the biggest challenges you faced while developing e-commerce websites
What's the amount of e-commerce websites you have worked at the same time
List down some of e-commerce websites you have worked on.
Are you currently employed? or free to join
knowledge of AI and Machine Learning ( required )
